{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Faruzan)
:{{A|vo card faruzan invite easy 01.ogg}} '''Faruzan:''' Alright, we can play a round. It's been a while since I hung out with you youngsters.

;(When the player defeats two of Faruzan's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card faruzan ingame easy 03.ogg}} '''Faruzan:''' N&mdash;Nothing to fret about!

;(When Faruzan defeats one of the player's Character Cards)

===Serious Showdown===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Faruzan)
:{{A|vo card faruzan invite hard 01.ogg}} '''Faruzan:''' Sure, I just happen to be taking a walk to clear my head. Those ancient texts were making me all dizzy... so a game should be a nice change of pace.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Let me adjust my deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Faruzan's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card faruzan ingame hard 02.ogg}} '''Faruzan:''' Hmm, seems you've put some thought into your tactics.

;(When the player defeats two of Faruzan's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card faruzan ingame hard 03.ogg}} '''Faruzan:''' *sigh* When you've been around for as long as I have, it's hard to stay sharp all the time...

;(When Faruzan defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card faruzan ingame hard 01.ogg}} '''Faruzan:''' Focus now &mdash; show me what you're really made of.

;(When Faruzan uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card faruzan ingame hard 04.ogg}} '''Faruzan:''' Don't underestimate your elders.

;(If the player wins the match)

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card faruzan invite hard 02.ogg}} '''Faruzan:''' Phew... I feel a lot better now. If you still want to play a few more rounds, just say the word.
{{Dialogue End}}

{{Dialogue Start}}

:{{A|vo card faruzan freetalk 01.ogg}} '''Faruzan:''' Actually, who came up with this game anyway? With the amount of calculations that you have to do every game... Don't tell me it was one of those Rtawahist kids?
